articles.author: Nick Cawley
articles.title: Markets Week Ahead: Gold Under Pressure, US Equities Rally, USD Holds Recent Highs - DailyFX
articles.description: US equities have shaken off their poor start to the year and are now posting fresh multi-year and all-time highs. Growing expectations of a soft landing and falling inflation in the US is driving the latest move higher.
